name: marikobot-hashi
description: A discord.js wrapper to create bots in a simpler way. Used for MarikoBot.
author: Elouann H. (https://github.com/elouannh)

scripts.clean: npm run prettier && npm run lint
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run run-builder && tsc && git add .
scripts.post-version-push: git push && npm publish && git push --tags
scripts.publish-patch: npm version patch && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-minor: npm version minor && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-major: npm version major && npm run post-version-push
scripts.publish-prerel: npm version prerelease --preid=${TAG} && npm run post-version-push
scripts.devbuild: npm run prepublish -- --MESSAGE='Devbuild version' && npm run publish-prerel -- --TAG='devbuild'
